00035 SCA_PythonKeyboard::SCA_PythonKeyboard(SCA_IInputDevice* keyboard)
00036 : PyObjectPlus(),
00037 m_keyboard(keyboard)
00038 {
00039 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00040     m_event_dict = PyDict_New();
00041 #endif
00042 }
00043 
00044 SCA_PythonKeyboard::~SCA_PythonKeyboard()
00045 {
00046 #ifdef WITH_PYTHON
00047     PyDict_Clear(m_event_dict);
00048     Py_DECREF(m_event_dict);
00049 #endif
00050 }

00085 PyAttributeDef SCA_PythonKeyboard::Attributes[] = {
00086     KX_PYATTRIBUTE_RO_FUNCTION("events", SCA_PythonKeyboard, pyattr_get_events),
00087     KX_PYATTRIBUTE_RO_FUNCTION("active_events", SCA_PythonKeyboard, pyattr_get_active_events),
00088     { NULL }    //Sentinel
00089 };
00090 
00091 PyObject* SCA_PythonKeyboard::pyattr_get_events(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00092 {
00093     SCA_PythonKeyboard* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonKeyboard*>(self_v);
00094     
00095     for (int i=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_BEGINKEY; i<=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_ENDKEY; i++)
00096     {
00097         const SCA_InputEvent & inevent = self->m_keyboard->GetEventValue((SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs)i);
00098         
00099         PyDict_SetItem(self->m_event_dict, PyLong_FromSsize_t(i), PyLong_FromSsize_t(inevent.m_status));
00100     }
00101     Py_INCREF(self->m_event_dict);
00102     return self->m_event_dict;
00103 }
00104 
00105 PyObject* SCA_PythonKeyboard::pyattr_get_active_events(void *self_v, const KX_PYATTRIBUTE_DEF *attrdef)
00106 {
00107     SCA_PythonKeyboard* self = static_cast<SCA_PythonKeyboard*>(self_v);
00108 
00109     PyDict_Clear(self->m_event_dict);
00110     
00111     for (int i=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_BEGINKEY; i<=SCA_IInputDevice::KX_ENDKEY; i++)
00112     {
00113         const SCA_InputEvent & inevent = self->m_keyboard->GetEventValue((SCA_IInputDevice::KX_EnumInputs)i);
00114         
00115         if (inevent.m_status != SCA_InputEvent::KX_NO_INPUTSTATUS)
00116             PyDict_SetItem(self->m_event_dict, PyLong_FromSsize_t(i), PyLong_FromSsize_t(inevent.m_status));
00117     }
00118     Py_INCREF(self->m_event_dict);
00119     return self->m_event_dict;
00120 }
